SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.annotation

Interface Annotation

All Known Subinterfaces:
AnnotationWithMarks
All Known Implementing Classes:
DualMarksAnnotation, ImageLabelAnnotation
public interface Annotation
Base class for types of image annotations.

Annotations are a form of ground-truth associated with an image, or part of an image.
